subfields.name: group
subfields.label: Group
subfields.helptext: Group to map volume access to. Default is no group.

subfields.name: registry
subfields.label: Registry
subfields.helptext: Registry represents a single or multiple Quobyte Registry services specified as a string as host:port pair (multiple entries are separated with commas) which acts as the central registry for volumes.

subfields.name: tenant
subfields.label: Tenant
subfields.helptext: Tenant owning the given Quobyte volume in the Backend Used with dynamically provisioned Quobyte volumes, value is set by the plugin.

subfields.name: user
subfields.label: User
subfields.helptext: User to map volume access to. Defaults to serviceaccount user.

subfields.name: volume
subfields.label: Vloume
subfields.helptext: Volume is a string that references an already created Quobyte volume by name.

subfields.name: readOnly
subfields.label: Read Only
subfields.helptext: Enabling it will force the ReadOnly property in VolumeMounts.
